sentence: The image is an advertisement featuring a McDonald's Sausage & Egg McMuffin.
sentence_cn: 该图片是一则以麦当劳香肠和鸡蛋松饼为特色的广告。

sentence: The sandwich is shown at the top of the image, highlighting its layers of muffin, sausage patty, egg, and cheese.
sentence_cn: 三明治显示在图片的顶部，突出了松饼、香肠肉饼、鸡蛋和奶酪的层次。

sentence: Above the sandwich is the McDonald's logo and the slogan "i'm lovin' it" in white text on a red background.
sentence_cn: 三明治上方是麦当劳的标志和红底白字的口号“我就喜欢它”。

sentence: Below the McMuffin, there is a 3D text saying "THE REST OF THE DAY HAS A LOT TO LIVE UP TO" in bold, playful yellow and orange lettering.
sentence_cn: 麦满分下方有一段 3D 文字，以大胆、俏皮的黄色和橙色字体写着“剩下的一天还有很多事情要做”。
words: THE REST OF THE DAY HAS A LOT TO LIVE UP TO

sentence: At the bottom, the text reads: "The Sausage & Egg McMuffin. Made with British pork and free range eggs.
sentence_cn: 底部的文字写着：“香肠鸡蛋松饼。采用英国猪肉和散养鸡蛋制成。
供应时间：早上 6 点至上午 10 点 30 分。”

sentence: There is a small footnote mentioning that availability may vary and gives a URL for more details.
sentence_cn: 有一个小脚注提到可用性可能会有所不同，并提供了一个 URL 以获取更多详细信息。

sentence: The McDonald's copyright note is also at the bottom.
sentence_cn: 麦当劳的版权声明也在底部。
